A Beginner to Intermediate Guide

Excel is a powerful tool for data analysis, but knowing formulas and functions alone isnâ€™t enoughâ€”you need to understand how to apply them to real-world business scenarios. Many professionals use Excel daily, but few truly leverage it to solve workplace challenges.

This guide covers essential skills and techniques to help you transition from simply knowing Excel to using it effectively for data-driven decisions.
